statements: SELECT * FROM remote_work_data WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT employee_id, work_date, hours_worked FROM remote_work_data ORDER BY work_date DESC
SELECT SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM remote_work_data WHERE work_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT employee_id, AVG(productivity_rating) AS avg_productivity_rating FROM remote_work_data GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(productivity_rating) > 8
SELECT employee_id, employee_satisfaction_rating FROM remote_work_data WHERE employee_satisfaction_rating < 5 ORDER BY employee_satisfaction_rating ASC
SELECT * FROM remote_work_data ORDER BY work_date DESC, hours_worked ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_id, AVG(hours_worked) AS avg_hours_worked FROM remote_work_data WHERE productivity_rating > 4 GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM remote_work_data WHERE employee_satisfaction_rating < 3 GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2

SELECT AVG(productivity_rating) AS avg_productivity_rating, AVG(employee_satisfaction_rating) AS avg_employee_satisfaction_rating FROM remote_work_data WHERE work_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM remote_work_data WHERE employee_id = 1001 AND hours_worked > 5 ORDER BY work_date ASC
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT employee_name, department, role FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department, role FROM employees WHERE productivity_score > 80 AND satisfaction_score > 70;
SELECT report_type, COUNT(*) FROM reports GROUP BY report_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Financial Report';
SELECT employee_name, department, role FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT report_type, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE productivity_score > 80 AND satisfaction_score < 50 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_satisfaction FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_trends;
SELECT employee_id, hours_worked FROM remote_work_trends WHERE hours_worked > 8;
SELECT employee_id, remote_location FROM remote_work_trends ORDER BY remote_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM productivity_data WHERE project_id = 12345;
SELECT MAX(hours_spent), employee_id FROM productivity_data GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_trends WHERE hours_worked > 8 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM remote_work_trends GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_reports > 5 ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM employee_satisfaction GROUP BY employee_id HAVING avg_satisfaction > 3 ORDER BY avg_satisfaction DESC;

SELECT p.employee_id, p.project_id, pd.hours_spent FROM productivity_data pd JOIN employee_satisfaction e ON pd.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN remote_work_trends r ON pd.employee_id = r.employee_id WHERE pd.hours_spent > 10 AND r.hours_worked < 8 ORDER BY pd.date ASC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.feedback, r.hours_worked, pd.project_id FROM employee_satisfaction e INNER JOIN remote_work_trends r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id LEFT JOIN productivity_data pd ON e.employee_id = pd.employee_id WHERE e.date = '2021-10-15' AND r.report_date < '2021-09-30' ORDER BY e.satisfaction_level DESC, r.report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT employee_id, report_date, report_type FROM reports WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT report_date, report_type FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_data WHERE work_location = 'Home' ORDER BY work_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_score FROM productivity_data GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type FROM reports WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS work_count FROM remote_work_data GROUP BY employee_id HAVING work_count > 5;

SELECT p.employee_id, AVG(p.productivity_score) AS avg_productivity FROM productivity_data p INNER JOIN reports r ON p.employee_id = r.employee_id GROUP BY p.employee_id ORDER BY avg_productivity DESC;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.satisfaction_score, s.feedback_text FROM employee_satisfaction e LEFT JOIN satisfaction_data s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE e.satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY e.employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_type, report_description FROM reports WHERE report_id = 3
SELECT * FROM remote_work_trends LIMIT 5
SELECT trend_name, trend_data->>'trend_value' AS value FROM remote_work_trends WHERE trend_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employee_data WHERE employee_department = 'HR'
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_type, report_description FROM reports WHERE report_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM productivity JOIN employee_data ON productivity.employee_id = employee_data.employee_id WHERE productivity_score > 80;

SELECT employee_name, employee_position, satisfaction_rating FROM employee_data JOIN employee_satisfaction ON employee_data.employee_id = employee_satisfaction.employee_id WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3;
SELECT trend_name, trend_data FROM remote_work_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trend_date <= '2022-02-01';
